name: Sin Eater
description:
A short visual novel created over 14 days in Ren'Py for My First Game Jam!

In which you assist Sin Eater with the eating of sins.

Featuring two routes and several possibilities based on your choices.

Please note this game contains depictions of violence, non-graphic death, and foul language.

This game is free, but if you enjoyed it and want to send a tip, may I direct you to http://ko-fi.com/gutter
